column5: This resort used to be called the El Senator. Has anyone been here before, read lots of great reviews...  Now everything looks goo, kids activities etc  My question is fishing can you fish right form the beach? what are the regulations with that? I have erad that there are cudas and sharks so this is right up my ally...  any help would be great

stayed there 2 years ago went out to cayo guelemaro tarpoon cuda grouper sharks 175 usd a day i will try to dig up pictures with name of the fishing club resort was great you can catch fish atr the resort get the sail boat guys to take you out on cat and troll we rented a vehicle and toured around fishing all sorts of fish and lots bof charter operators in area you wont be diappointed Peter
thanks so much!!! if you think of the name drop me a PM if you can! so I will have to get my gear ready!  What kind of sharks did you guys catch?

I was there this December and guys were fishing right in the LAgoon there for cudas and getting them.  And apperantly just outside the resort there is a cliff and the get huge cudas off there.  Hope this helps....if I go next time I am bringing my stuff for sure.  As far as I know you don't need a fishing licence either!
thanks alot man!!! got a load of good cuda baits!  how far is the lagoon frmo the resort?

lagoon is on the resort kind of a stagnant pool when we were there you can see the cudas swimming around if you go down to the beach and hang a right (fill cooler jug with your choosen poison first ) you can see the cliff about 900 yards lots of big cudas and the odd shark swimming around sorry dont know what kind of sharks they were about 6 feet long didnt have the right bait I guess ill look for all the info i have tonight or tommorow Peter
Cudas are the right bait!  6 feet eh...  thanks again Peter
